thread.title: Magenta tint when using ATI card

post.author: blender81
post.body:
I'm currently working on a Doom 3 engine game. When I use my NVidia card, everything works fine.

When place in an ATI (Radeon HD 5450) card, everything becomes magenta

Though, stock Doom 3 displays fine with both cards. Has anyone seen anything like this in their builds?

post.author: blender81
post.body: Figured it out: apparently my card doesn't cooperate with the "r_clear" console call. Setting "r_clear" to its default value of zero solves this magenta problem.
